title: TITAN MIXER BOTTLE
subtitle: Ref. Code TITAN
description: TITAN Mixer Bottle® mixes your protein and supplements more efficiently than ever with the patented Helix-Blade Technology giving you delicious clump free drinks. Conveniently pour your supplements mess free with the TITAN Funnel Cup storage compartment which holds up to 8 oz (237ml). Adding soap, water, and few pumps to quickly clean your TITAN Mixer Bottle®.
